meanings.sent1: The illustrator drew colorful pictures for the book.
meanings.sent2: The talented illustrator sketched a beautiful landscape.
meanings.sent3: The illustrator's drawings always brought a smile to people's faces.
meanings.sent4: She was an illustrator of emotions, capturing joy and sorrow in her art.
meanings.sent5: The illustrator's work was so detailed, it felt like stepping into a different world.

meanings.definition: A software program used for creating illustrations.
meanings.sent1: I used the illustrator to design a logo for my business.
meanings.sent2: The new version of the illustrator has many advanced features.
meanings.sent3: The illustrator made it easy for me to bring my ideas to life.
meanings.sent4: With the illustrator, I felt like a digital artist exploring endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The illustrator's user-friendly interface made creating graphics a breeze.
